tool.title: External Tool
tool.description: Launch external tools using IMS Learning Tools Interoperability.

tool.title: Zoom - Quick Launch
tool.description: Integration with Zoom web conferencing tool. Please activate your NYU Zoom account at https://nyu.zoom.us before using the tool.
